name: 1 core
command: sudo qemu-system-x86_64 -smp 1 -cpu qemu64,apic,fsgsbase,rdtscp,xsave,xsaveopt,fxsr,rdrand -display none -m 128M -serial stdio -kernel hermit-loader-x86_64 -initrd build-x86_64/startup_bench

name: 2 cores
command: sudo qemu-system-x86_64 -smp 2 -cpu qemu64,apic,fsgsbase,rdtscp,xsave,xsaveopt,fxsr,rdrand -display none -m 128M -serial stdio -kernel hermit-loader-x86_64 -initrd build-x86_64/startup_bench

name: 4 cores
command: sudo qemu-system-x86_64 -smp 4 -cpu qemu64,apic,fsgsbase,rdtscp,xsave,xsaveopt,fxsr,rdrand -display none -m 128M -serial stdio -kernel hermit-loader-x86_64 -initrd build-x86_64/startup_bench

name: Pi Multithreaded Benchmark
command: sudo qemu-system-x86_64 -smp 4 -cpu qemu64,apic,fsgsbase,rdtscp,xsave,xsaveopt,fxsr,rdrand -display none -m 512M -serial stdio -kernel hermit-loader-x86_64 -initrd build-x86_64/multithreaded_bench

name: Mutex Stress Test
command: sudo qemu-system-x86_64 -smp 2 -cpu qemu64,apic,fsgsbase,rdtscp,xsave,xsaveopt,fxsr,rdrand -display none -m 512M -serial stdio -kernel hermit-loader-x86_64 -initrd build-x86_64/mutex_bench

name: Allocation Benchmarks
command: sudo qemu-system-x86_64 -smp 1 -cpu qemu64,apic,fsgsbase,rdtscp,xsave,xsaveopt,fxsr,rdrand -display none -m 2G -serial stdio -kernel hermit-loader-x86_64 -initrd build-x86_64/alloc_bench

name: Micro Benchmarks
command: sudo qemu-system-x86_64 -smp 4 -cpu qemu64,apic,fsgsbase,rdtscp,xsave,xsaveopt,fxsr,rdrand -display none -m 2G -serial stdio -kernel hermit-loader-x86_64 -initrd build-x86_64/micro_bench
